content.question: Prior to the expansion of the factory system during the Industrial Revolution, which of the following contributed to the increase in production of manufactured goods

choices.label: Importation of silk and cotton cloth from the Far East
Expansion of the guild system in urban centers
Expansion of cottage industries in the countryside
The completion of the railway system

content.answer: Expansion of cottage industries in the countryside

topic.text: 3.3: Continuities and Changes to Economic Practice and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
